suite.name: Signup

test.name: Deve poder cadastrar um novo usuário

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${user} = {'name': 'Wellington Júnior', 'email': 'wpsjunior23@gmail.com', 'password': 'pwd123'}

kw.name: Remove user from database
kw.msg: removing user by wpsjunior23@gmail.com

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "C:\\QAx\\projects\\mark85-robot-express\\results\\browser\\traces\\d3ae3667-2348-4250-8c3a-27e9141ee51d"}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://localhost:3000/
No context was open. New context was automatically opened when this page is created.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Successfully opened URL http://localhost:3000/signup

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=h1 at state visible

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Text: 'Faça seu cadastro'

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Wellington Júnior' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'wpsjunior23@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'pwd123' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.notice p at state visible

kw.name: Get Text
kw.arg: Boas vindas ao Mark85, o seu gerenciador de tarefas.
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Text: 'Boas vindas ao Mark85, o seu gerenciador de tarefas.'

test.name: Não deve permitir o cadastro com email duplicado
